A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappoints\, Although visually stunning at times the story\, pacing and character development are all over the place and almost non existent. This is the first time I think I left the theatre indifferent to a Star Wars movie.  Not terrible\, but not good either. Just a mediocre movie with some nice effects. Kills a couple of hours \, Not worth a second viewing.
